Package com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.card

Interface D1ClickToPay

  • public interface D1ClickToPay
    Main interface of the enrol to click to pay.
    Since:
    4.2.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  D1ClickToPay.Status
      Enum representing the status of the Click to Pay enrollment process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Enroll the card in Click to Pay.

    • Method Detail

      • enrol

        void enrol​(@NonNull
           String cardID,
           @NonNull
           ConsumerInfo consumerInfo,
           @Nullable
           String name,
           @Nullable
           BillingAddress billingAddress,
           @NonNull
           D1Task.Callback<D1ClickToPay.Status> callback)
        Enroll the card in Click to Pay. Once the enrollment is successful, the tokenization process is completed. The enrollment status in the Integrator system will be updated via a push notification. Before calling this Click to Pay API, integrator should display the default value of consumerInfo and billingAddress collect the end user inputs of consumerInfo,
        Parameters:
        cardID - The card identifier
        consumerInfo - ConsumerInfo The consumer info object is initialized initialized with user inputs for first name,middle name, last name, language, phone number, country code and email.
        name - The card holder name as present on the card. It is applicable only to Visa.
        billingAddress - Billing Address associated to the card enrolled to Click to Pay. Mandatory for Visa.
        callback - The callback for the result. When it is successful, the returned argument of the D1Task.Callback.onSuccess(Object) is D1ClickToPay.Status.
        Possible errors:
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_AUTHORIZED
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD_NOT_FOUND
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_DEVICE_ENVIRONMENT_UNSAFE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_ACTIVE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_INVALID_FIRST_NAME
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_INVALID_LAST_NAME
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_INVALID_LANGUAGE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER_COUNTRY_CODE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_INVALID_BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRY_CODE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_SCHEME_AMBIGUOUS_PROFILE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_SCHEME_RESOURCE_EXISTS
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_SCHEME_CARD_INELIGIBLE
        Since:
        4.2.0

      • optOutCard

        void optOutCard​(@NonNull
                String cardID,
                @NonNull
                D1Task.Callback<D1ClickToPay.Status> callback)
        Opt-out the card from Click to Pay. Once the opt-out is successful, the tokenization process is completed. The enrollment status in the Integrator system will be updated via a push notification.
        Parameters:
        cardID - The card identifier
        callback - The callback for the result. When it is successful, the returned argument of the D1Task.Callback.onSuccess(Object) is D1ClickToPay.Status.
        Possible errors:
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_NOT_AUTHORIZED
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD_NOT_FOUND
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_DEVICE_ENVIRONMENT_UNSAFE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CARD_OPERATION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_SCHEME_AMBIGUOUS_PROFILE
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_SCHEME_RESOURCE_EXISTS
        • D1Exception.ErrorCode.ERROR_CLICKTOPAY_SCHEME_CARD_INELIGIBLE
        Since:
        4.2.0
